nodes.text: Garank was a Gamorrean male member of the Nihil. In 232 BBY, he and other members of the Nihil were ordered by Marchion Ro to send a message to the Gaze Electric's captain. But Garank betrayed the other members and went off to deliver the message on his own. Garank was then eaten by a Bogaranth that was being ridden by the other Nihil pirates.
